title: Remote Virtual Assistant Job at Styaks Legal
content:
Styaks Legal - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Remote Virtual Assistant
Job Location: Abuja / Lagos / Abeokuta - Ogun / Ibadan - Oyo (Remote)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our client is looking for a sharp, reliable, and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support their dynamic consulting and compliance practice.
	This is a remote role, open to qualified candidates based in Abuja, Lagos, Abeokuta - Ogun &  Ibadan - Oyo


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage calendars, meetings, and professional correspondence using Outlook
	Maintain organized client records and workflows in HubSpot CRM
	Prepare and format reports, presentations, and documents using PowerPoint, Word, and Excel
	Coordinate and manage files and folders using SharePoint
	Assist with internal communications, follow-ups, and task tracking
	Provide day-to-day virtual support to the leadership and consulting teams.


Required Skills & Experience


	Proficient in SharePoint for document management and collaboration
	Experience using HubSpot or similar CRM platforms
	Strong Microsoft Office skills (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
	Previous experience supporting consulting, compliance, or legal professionals
	Reliable internet connection and work-from-home setup
	Familiarity with Canva or basic graphic tools
	Excellent communication and organizational abilities
	Highly professional, self-motivated, and able to work independently
	Experience with social media scheduling or content assistance
	Prior remote work experience in a professional services setting


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: styakslegal@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Social Media Manager Job at Choice Talents NG
content:
Choice Talents NG is Nigeria’s preferred talents management company. Our goal is to help build successful businesses through effective talent, resource and process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Monitor and analyze social media trends and their impact on its brand for enhanced visibility and top-of-mind awareness.
	Provide monthly and comprehensive analytics on social media usage, e-channel metrics, and insights to inform marketing strategies and boost engagement.
	Engage in real-time interactions by responding to questions, offering solutions, and creating content that fosters vibrant discussions on social media to grow the Institute's community.
	Capture, post, and promote all its events online to ensure maximum reach and engagement.
	Explore new opportunities for social marketing platforms, identifying trending networks that cater to its stakeholders and community.
	Market its offerings effectively through social media.
	Plan and execute targeted social media campaigns, including paid advertising, to achieve specific objectives like lead generation and brand awareness.
	Track, analyze, and report on key social media metrics (e.g., engagement, reach, conversions) using tools like Hootsuite, Sprout Social, or native platform analytics, and provide insights for continuous improvement.
	Increase the Institute's social media following and engagement.
	Develop and implement social media strategies to enhance brand visibility, engagement, and followers across relevant platforms.
	Manage community engagement by responding promptly to comments, messages, and mentions to maintain a positive brand image.
	Stay up to date with the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices, incorporating them into the strategy as appropriate.
	Engage with influencers, brand advocates, and key industry figures to amplify its brand reach and credibility.
	Address negative social media feedback or crises in collaboration with the Team Lead and Corporate Communications, ensuring that the brand's reputation is safeguarded.
	Utilize social media listening tools to track brand mentions, competitor activity, and industry trends to inform strategy adjustments.
	Align social media efforts with the broader digital marketing strategy and business goals.
	Perform other related tasks as assigned.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / BSc Degree with 3 - 7 years of work experience.
	Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
	Strong knowledge of major social media platforms and their features.
	Proficiency in graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Suite) and video editing software.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Creative mindset with a keen eye for design and storytelling.
	Ability to analyze data and translate it into actionable strategies.
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills, with the ability to meet deadlines.
	Familiarity with influencer marketing and brand collaborations is a plus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Portfolio of your previous works to: jobs@choicetalents.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Loan Collection Officer Job at Befreedom Outsourcing Limited
content:
Befreedom Outsourcing Limited is a professional collection service provider that deals with helping various loan agencies in retrieving back their bad-loans as fast and effectively as possible.

We make calls to customers to pay their outstanding debts, Send messages to customers, Guide customers through the payment process, Persuade reluctant customers to make payment promptly, Meet weekly and monthly targets, Give proper and correct report of work. We build a professional team with experienced collectors for every loan agency, using SMS, calls, emails, various social media platforms to remind and encourage overdue customers to make repayments. BFREEDOMprovides financial solutions by helping loan companies recover back bad debts.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Loan Collection Officer
Job Location: Jankara ijaiye, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	The Ideal candidate should understand how to manage clients.
	Make calls to customers to pay their outstanding debt.
	Send messages to customers.
	Guide customers through the payment process.
	Persuade reluctant customers to make payments promptly.
	Meet weekly and monthly targets.
	Give proper and correct report of work.

	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree, HND or NCE in relevant fields with 0 - 1 year of work experience.

Benefits


	Salary: Basic Salary: N60,000
	Bonuses: Up to N70000 monthly.

title: Director, Human Resources Job at Outsource Nigeria
content:
Outsource Nigeria is a full-service Human Resources agency, specializing in providing outsourced turnkey manpower solutions to growing companies. Our solution include HR Services, Recruiting, Accounting, IT Support, Business Intelligence, Developers, and Operations including management and field / phone / automated based resources. The core of Outsource Nigeria’s success is its people.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Director, Human Resources
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reporting To: Managing Director, Nigeria and West Africa & Chief People Officer
Key Interactions: Team Directors, CEO
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



What You’ll Be Doing
People & Culture:


	Be a culture champion. Lead the rollout of people-first HR strategies and initiatives that align with our mission, values, and goals
	Be a trusted partner. Support managers with expert HR advice – from diagnosing challenges to co-creating solutions that unlock team potential.
	Hire right. Own end-to-end talent acquisition for Nigeria – sourcing, interviewing, and onboarding the best and brightest with the right skills and the right attitude.
	Nurture growth. Help employees tap into learning opportunities. Design training programs or partner with providers to develop our people.
	Create a winning experience. Ensure every touchpoint in the employee lifecycle – from onboarding to exit – is seamless, compliant, and meaningful.
	Know the market. Stay on top of compensation trends to ensure Pulse remains competitive, fair, and attractive to top talent.
	Drive performance. Manage our performance cycle with intention – from regular check-ins to formal reviews – keeping goals aligned and teams motivated.
	Keep us compliant. Maintain up-to-date records – from payroll to work permits – and ensure we’re always audit-ready.
	Track the pulse. Use HR metrics to monitor engagement and guide decision-making that drives a thriving workplace.


Key Responsibilities:


	HR Strategy & Culture, Talent Acquisition & Onboarding, Performance Management, Officer Operations & Admin


Other Responsibilities:


	The Director of HR will be expected to lead the strategic people agenda, partner closely with the executive team, and drive organizational effectiveness across a dynamic and growing business.


Criteria


	Proven experience working closely with senior management and other executives, particularly in providing strategic input on recruitment, performance management, talent development, and organizational growth
	Strong ability to navigate and manage a complex organizational structure
	Sector experience in media, marketing, telecommunications, or advertising is highly preferred
	Notice period of no more than one to two months


Compensation Package


	Monthly gross salary:NGN 1,500,000
	Quarterly variable pay:NGN 600,000, awarded based on achievement of set KPIs
	Access to training and growth opportunities within the organization


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@outsourcenigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
